column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Been around forever on Halsted and have visited multiple times because it was in neighborhood.. Seems to be always packed so must be appreciated. I thought this time it was mediocre food and selections. Perhaps because I am not-30 something anymore. What no sherry options on the wine list!? Maybe because we were there this time in afternoon but I asked for full menu which was limited and uninspired. OK
column2: nice to have shrimp in the build your own Bloody Mary etc. but there is no challenge or excitement for me in this place. Probably the only restaurant I have had arguments in. Maybe the wait
